ComicInfo.Summary:
No Childish Games, part 2
The city is brought down by a tide of child abductions. Kids disappear in groups. Danila and Sneak are pretty sure that there are demonic forces involved. Soon they discover that all the abducted teenagers are delivered to the abandoned factory to take part in Cowboys and Indians game. Kids, the Cowboys, are supposed to run from the Indians (evil spirits) until one final participant is left. The winner will be granted a wish. Demonslayer finds out that there is a mighty demon behind the kidnappings. But what does he need kids for? In order to find the answer Danila and Sneak have to take part in the infernal Games...
